summary: Paul, a handsome and talented music student is employed as the page-turner at one of the world famous pianist Kennington's concerts in San Francisco.
cast: Juliet Stevenson|Kevin Bishop|Allan Corduner|Paul Rhys|Craig Hill|Leslie Charles|Pamela Field|Naim Thomas|Geraldine McEwan|Mingo Ràfols|Roger Coma|Pepa López|Mauricio Cruz|Manu Fullola|Carlos Castañón|Hernán González|Brenda Roque|Helenika Hellevig|Marianne Maili|Sue Flack|Jack McKusay|Miquel Bordoy|Joan Estrada
title: Manjar de amor
